article.excerpt: Throughout the years, tmux has been on the top of the productivity tools that I use on a daily basis. It allows me to manage multiple projects simultaneously with ease in the terminal.

authors.bio:

next.title: Sending asynchronous requests after leaving a page
next.author: Amr Elsekilly
next.excerpt: Most of us must have struggled in the past with sending asynchronous requests when a user decides to leave a page. Whether you're trying to send analytics data or sending a small application-specific data to the backend when the user decides to leave your page
